rules_text:
[i]Ephraim's Charger[/i] – Knights you control have haste.
[i]For Renais[/i] – Whenever you cast a red spell, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
[i][i]Lieutenant[/i]'s Orders[/i] – {4}{R}{W}: Create three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance. Activate this ability only if attacked with a Knight this turn.
